typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 要存储在集合中的元素的类型。

span.span: The type of the elements to be stored in the collection.

summary.span: 表示对象的线程安全的无序集合。

span.span: Represents a thread-safe, unordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当排序并不重要时，包可用于存储对象，而与集不同，包支持重复项。Bags are useful for storing objects when ordering doesn't matter, and unlike sets, bags support duplicates. 是一个线程安全包实现，适用于同一线程将生成和使用存储在包中的数据的情况。 is a thread-safe bag implementation, optimized for scenarios where the same thread will be both producing and consuming data stored in the bag. 接受 `null` 作为引用类型的有效值。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types. 有关详细信息，请参阅 ".NET 并行编程" 博客中的 " [常见问题解答：所有新的并发回收](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/faq-are-all-of-the-new-concurrent-collections-lock-free/) "。For more information, see the entry [FAQ: Are all of the new concurrent collections lock-free?](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/faq-are-all-of-the-new-concurrent-collections-lock-free/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在中添加和移除项 ：The following example shows how to add and remove items from a : [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.collections.concurrent/concurrentbag/concbag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.collections.concurrent/concurrentbag/concbag.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有公共和受保护的成员 都是线程安全的，可从多个线程并发使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 但是，通过实现的接口之一（ 包括扩展方法）访问的成员不一定是线程安全的，并且可能需要由调用方进行同步。

span.span: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the implements, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.
Thread-Safe Collections

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 中包含的元素数。

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的计数表示袋内容的时间快照。The count returned represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 在访问属性后，其他线程可能会立即添加或移除项 `Count` 。It is possible that other threads might add or remove items immediately after you access the `Count` property.

span.span: Thread-Safe Collections

Public Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator(Of T)
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<'T> override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<'T>

summary.span: 返回遍历 的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An enumerator for the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举表示包内容的时间的快照。The enumeration represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 它不会反映调用后对集合的任何更新 。It does not reflect any updates to the collection after was called. 枚举器可以安全地与包的读取和写入操作一起使用。The enumerator is safe to use concurrently with reads from and writes to the bag.

span.span: Thread-Safe Collections
